landing.title:
Luis Espinoza
IA-Driven Product Engineer
landing.message: AI-Driven Product Engineer with 4+ years building scalable mobile and web applications that impact millions of users. Specialized in React Native and TypeScript, I leverage cutting-edge AI tools (Cursor, Claude Code, Codex, GitHub Copilot, Warp) to deliver 10x faster development cycles while maintaining production-grade quality in FinTech and EventTech.

impact.label: Downloads on developed apps
impact.description: Contributed to Pago Fácil development with 1.5M+ downloads and 500K monthly active users.

launches.label: Years in FinTech and EventTech
launches.description: Experience developing in high-demand technical sectors like finance and events.

leadership.label: Main specialty
leadership.description: Native mobile development for iOS and Android with clean architecture and optimized performance.

stack.title: Stack & AI Arsenal
stack.description: React Native, TypeScript, Firebase, AWS, Redux powered by AI acceleration: Cursor for intelligent refactoring, Claude Code for context-aware suggestions, Codex for complex problem-solving, GitHub Copilot for rapid prototyping, and Warp for terminal efficiency. Clean Architecture patterns ensure every line ships with confidence.

product.title: Specialized mobile development
product.description: Create robust React Native applications with API integration, authentication, and real-time databases.

delivery.title: AI-Powered Development Velocity
delivery.description: Master AI-assisted development with Cursor, Claude Code, Codex, GitHub Copilot and Warp to ship features 10x faster without compromising code quality or architectural integrity.

partnership.title: Technical collaboration
partnership.description: Work efficiently in multidisciplinary teams, maintain clean code and clear documentation.

skills.title: SKILLS
skills.intro: Mobile-first engineer who ships production-ready features at 10x velocity. Powered by AI tools and battle-tested in FinTech (1.5M+ users) and EventTech platforms. Here's how I turn complex requirements into elegant, scalable solutions.

product.title: Mobile & Web Development
product.description: Architect and ship production-grade mobile and web applications trusted by millions of active users.
product.bullets: Build native iOS & Android apps with React Native, achieving 60fps animations and offline-first architecture.|Develop high-performance web apps with Next.js 15, React 19 and TypeScript, optimized for Core Web Vitals.|Integrate complex payment APIs (Western Union, MercadoPago), OAuth flows, real-time databases and push notification systems.

engineering.title: Architecture & AI Tools
engineering.description: Apply Clean Architecture and accelerate development with AI.
engineering.bullets: Leverage AI tools (Cursor, Claude Code, Codex, Copilot, Warp) to accelerate development, automated testing and intelligent debugging.|Architect clean, maintainable codebases using MVVM and MVCP patterns with separation of concerns.|Build scalable infrastructure with Firebase, AWS Lambda, PostgreSQL and cloud-native microservices.

enablement.title: Collaboration & Continuous Delivery
enablement.description: Work efficiently in agile multidisciplinary teams.
enablement.bullets: Collaborate closely with design, QA and backend teams.|Participate in agile methodologies and high-pressure deliveries.|Maintain quality code with Git, testing and clear documentation.

quote.text: The intersection of AI-assisted development and clean architecture principles. I don't just write code faster—I ship production-ready features that scale.
quote.author: Development Philosophy

ethos.title: ETHOS
ethos.intro: Empathy from philosophy sharpens my product thinking. Precision from engineering ensures architectural excellence. AI tools (Cursor, Claude Code, Codex, Copilot, Warp) multiply my velocity 10x without sacrificing craft.

media.label: Curiosity in practice
media.caption: Always learning—philosophy, systems and craft to match ambition with delivery.
media.alt: Illustration of Luis reading a book

ethos.story: Philosophy taught me to interrogate problems deeply before writing a single line of code—understanding the 'why' creates better solutions.|I approach development as a craft: clean architecture, meaningful tests, and AI tools that accelerate without compromising quality.|Every feature I ship is production-ready, monitored, and built to scale—because velocity without reliability is just technical debt.

0.description: Developing PSP solution integrating multiple digital wallets and improving Pago Fácil app with 1.5M+ downloads.

1.description: Developed event platform with end-to-end features, real-time calendar and digital ticketing system.

2.description: Created custom management systems with Spring Boot, PostgreSQL and responsive websites for organizations.

0.quote: Mobile-first architecture with AI-accelerated workflows. React Native expert who's shipped features to 1.5M+ users in production FinTech apps.
0.author: Technical Excellence

1.quote: Master of modern stack: React Native, TypeScript, Next.js 15, Firebase, AWS. Powered by Cursor, Claude Code, Codex, Copilot and Warp for 10x development velocity.
1.author: AI-Driven Approach

works.title: WORKS
works.intro: Real-world projects where technical excellence meets business impact. From FinTech platforms serving 1.5M+ users to EventTech experiences processing thousands of real-time transactions—these are production systems, not demos.

Pago Fácil & Western Union.name: Pago Fácil & Western Union
Pago Fácil & Western Union.description: Mobile Developer at Bizland Tech contributing to a mission-critical PSP (Payment Service Provider) solution powering Pago Fácil's 1.5M+ downloads and 500K monthly active users. Shipped production features for Western Union integration, optimized app stability and resolved P0 incidents affecting real financial transactions.
Pago Fácil & Western Union.highlights: Architected PSP integration layer supporting multiple digital wallets (Western Union, local payment providers) with transaction-level reliability.|Shipped production features using React Native, TypeScript, Redux for state management, and Firebase for real-time data sync.|Reduced crash rate by 40% through performance profiling, memory optimization and proactive error boundaries.|Resolved P0 production incidents with <30min response time, maintaining 99.9% uptime during peak transaction hours.
Pago Fácil & Western Union.result: Impact: 1.5M+ downloads, 500K monthly active users and improved stability.

0-Registros.name: 0-Registros
0-Registros.description: Zero-to-one experimental platform blending poetry, generative visuals and technology. Built a multi-language Next.js experience with p5.js animations and Firebase to support live performances.
0-Registros.highlights: Designed immersive storytelling with adaptive layouts and typographic systems.|Implemented a real-time creative engine combining p5.js scenes with curated writing.|Deployed bilingual monorepo with CMS-like authoring and staging for exhibitions.
0-Registros.result: Impact: Showcased at digital art festivals with seamless uptime during live readings.

Hybeans App.name: Hybeans App
Hybeans App.description: Built the flagship mobile experience (iOS & Android) for Hybeans EventTech platform, enabling real-time social interaction, e-commerce and ticketing for live events with thousands of concurrent users.
Hybeans App.highlights: Architected end-to-end mobile flows: Firebase Auth, real-time social feeds, live event booking system and in-app checkout processing payments during live events.|Built robust notification system with Firebase Cloud Messaging, deep linking navigation and analytics tracking (Mixpanel) covering complete user journey.|Delivered features under tight event deadlines with zero downtime during peak traffic (15K+ concurrent users), coordinating across design, backend and QA teams.
Hybeans App.result: Impact: Enabled 15K+ attendees to manage tickets, networking and purchases during live events.

FastForm.name: Fast Form
FastForm.description: Co-founded and engineered FastForm, a SaaS automation platform that transforms how teams create Google Forms—reducing 2-hour manual processes to 2-minute AI-powered workflows using GPT-4, CSV imports and visual builders.
FastForm.highlights: Architected full-stack SaaS product: GPT-4 powered chat interface, CSV parser with validation, drag-and-drop form builder and draft management system.|Built production app with Next.js 15 (App Router), React Server Components, TypeScript, Tailwind and Vercel deployment—achieving <1s page loads.|Integrated OpenAI API with streaming responses, Google Forms API for programmatic creation, OAuth 2.0 authentication and MercadoPago subscription billing.
FastForm.result: Impact: Teams cut form creation time from hours to minutes with auditable automations.

Push Notify.name: NOUS - Push Notify
Push Notify.description: Built a secure operations console for NOUS to orchestrate mass push notifications across their mobile ecosystem.
Push Notify.highlights: Implemented admin onboarding with service credential management and role-based access.|Added campaign segmentation, scheduling and live delivery telemetry dashboards.|Hardened Firebase Cloud Messaging pipelines with audit-ready logging and monitoring.
Push Notify.result: Impact: Reduced manual push campaigns while keeping GDPR-compliant messaging.

Filoweb.name: Filoweb
Filoweb.description: Designed Filoweb, an educational experience guiding newcomers through the history of philosophy with interactive storytelling.
Filoweb.highlights: Crafted narrative UX with timelines, author journeys and responsive layouts.|Optimized accessibility and performance to support classroom usage on any device.|Structured modular content so educators can publish new chapters without touching code.
Filoweb.result: Impact: Expanded the philosophy program reach to 5K+ readers annually.

Hybeans Web.name: Hybeans Web
Hybeans Web.description: Extended Hybeans to the web with conversion-driven landing pages, booking flows and personalization.
Hybeans Web.highlights: Built booking engine with real-time availability, payment checkout and confirmation flows.|Created customizable member profiles with social features and team dashboards.|Optimized React bundling with lazy loading and code-splitting to reduce initial load by 40%.
Hybeans Web.result: Impact: Boosted partner bookings and sponsorship conversions across LATAM.

AEG Hornos de Cerámica.name: AEG Ceramic Ovens
AEG Hornos de Cerámica.description: Delivered an operations platform for AEG Hornos de Cerámica, unifying marketing site and CRM backoffice for specialized technicians.
AEG Hornos de Cerámica.highlights: Developed CRM with customer segmentation, pricing management and suggestion pipelines.|Integrated TinyMCE email editor, Resend API and WhatsApp automations in one hub.|Implemented validations, pagination and media handling to keep data quality high.
AEG Hornos de Cerámica.result: Impact: Centralized operations and reduced manual follow-ups by 60%.
